decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Block plan, 120116,110116, 130116, 140116, 100116, 090116 received 05/02/2016, location plan received on 21/03/2016 and unnumbered Proposed site plan rear car park received 11/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The extension hereby approved shall be used for A1 retail use or ancillary use to the A1 retail use of the ground floor unit and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class A of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 5 - The parking spaces, delivery spaces and waste and recycling space as shown on drawing titled: Proposed site plan rear car park (received 11/04/2016) shall be implemented and available for use before first use of the extension hereby approved and shall thereafter be maintained as such and not be used for any other purposes.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the shop
